meanings.definition: To demonstrate in opposition to a demonstration.
meanings.sent1: During the protest, the group counterdemonstrated peacefully.
meanings.sent2: She counterdemonstrated against the unfair treatment of animals.
meanings.sent3: The penguins counterdemonstrated by waddling in the opposite direction.
meanings.sent4: His actions counterdemonstrated his true beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The students counterdemonstrated with colorful signs and chants.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, they counterdemonstrated against the new policy.
meanings.sent2: The activists counterdemonstrated at the city hall last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat counterdemonstrated by knocking over the protest signs.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication was counterdemonstrated by her attendance at every rally.
meanings.sent5: The community counterdemonstrated their unity by standing together.
